DOC.brief_summary: In trauma surgery hand surgery treatment strategy none heal bone fracture aim replace pseudarthrosis well vascularized bone improve microcirculation . Although previous study indicate extracorporeal shock wave therapy ( ESWT ) accelerate bone heal case non-union , study focus elucidation mechanism action . Therefore , aim study evaluate microcirculatory effect extracorporeal shock wave therapy scaphoid bone metacarpal metatarsal human in-vivo set first time .
DOC.brief_title: Bone Microcirculation After Extracorporeal Shock Wave Therapy
DOC.criteria: Group A ( n=20 ) : Consentcapable male female patient ≥18 year age intact scaphoid . Group B ( n=20 ) : Consentcapable male female patient ≥18 year age intact metacarpal bone . Group C ( n=20 ) : Consentcapable male female patient ≥18 year age fracture scaphoid . Group D ( n=20 ) : Consentcapable male female patient ≥18 year age fracture metacarpal bone . 18 year age scar tissue scaphoid metacarpal bone osteoporosis comparable bone disease medication influence bone
